msbt.message: Whoa! ! It's you! You're back!How long has it been? Like <50_8 x="0" y="2" a="years" b="whole year" c="years" />! I didn't realize it'd been that long.Don't give me that look. I remember you. How could I forget? I mean, you NAMED !Anyway, it really rocks to see you again, ! I hope I see you around!

Whoa! ! Been a while! Like <50_8 x="0" y="2" a="years" b="year" c="years" /> and <50_8 x="0" y="1" a="months" b="month" c="months" /> a while!Did you think I'd forgotten you? This is ! You live here. That's kind of a big deal to me!Anyway, it's awesome to see you again, . Don't be a stranger, alright?

Whoa! ! You're alright!We heard weird rumors, like a shark attack, or an alien abduction, or that you'd joined an alien-shark circus.Anyhoo, you look good! And different, like you've grown a bit, y'know? I dig it, !

Well, I guess I've finally lost my mind. I could swear I see in front of me.It's a really, reallyREAL-looking mirage too. Like, super real! Even kinda smells real, .Too bad it's a mirage though. It'd rock to have back. I miss 'em.

Hey, ! Long time, no see! Awesome to see you on again.Y'know, a few of us were just talkin' about you the other day, wondering where you'd gone.Said hi to the others yet? If not, you better hop to it. I bet they'll be thrilled to see you, !Anyway, welcome back!

?! Whoa! I haven't seen you in forever!It's been like <50_8 x="0" y="1" a="months" b="whole month" c="months" />, right? I mean, I figured you'd come back eventually, but still! Been a bit!It just hasn't been the same here without you, y'know? I really missed my party buddy, !

Well, if it isn't ! How long's it been? Like <50_8 x="0" y="1" a="months" b="whole month" c="months" /> or something, right?OK, so it's awesome to see you again and all, but you really had me worried. You just kinda disappeared.Anyway, you're back. You gonna stick around? 'Cause if so, we gotta party it up, !

Hey, ! Haven't seen you in a while. How've you been?You just not been feeling social lately? It's OK. I completely understand. I get that way too.Well, if you ever feel like chatting, feel free to hit me up, !

Hey there, ! You finally came by!I was kinda worried I made you mad or something. Usually I'd just come by and ask, but I got cold feet.Anyway, I'm super relieved we're still cool! Swing by again any time, !

Hey, uh, right?Just kidding! How are you? It's been a while!I've been so heads down on new gardening ideas lately, I haven't taken any time to be social.How long's it been, anyway? No way! <50_8 x="0" y="1" a="months" b="month" c="months" />?!Well slugs, I really gotta get out more,
